channel.title: Need Help With 4 Questions!
channel.description:
Hello,
I need help with 4 questions first 1 is
1.How can i make my Prayer work? when i click piety or smite wont work how can i make all of them work
2. How can i make a npc that can tele you to 4 places like
Kree`Arra General Graador King Black Dragon Chaos Elemental
3. How can i get my vengeance skull on the rigth place atm i got a teleport spell thingy there but i want the vengeance skull to stand there
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/X1RusherX1/Untitled2.png[/img]
4. My last question how can i make a command that bans you from "Yell" command? and sends a message "you have been banned from yell"? and a command that mutes you till you relog and sends "you have been muted till your relog"
Thanks For The Help!!!

item.title: Need Help With 4 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater

ok this was my command

item.title: Need Help With 4 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Soul Eater, post:9, topic:371604”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=467685.msg3420673#msg3420673 date=1291489896]

no one is gonna spoonfeed you so try tyo work it out your self w/e the guy above you said

L… did i ask somewane to spoonfeed me? finished all except 4

Basically,
Create a character token like banyell

or something similar

Then change your yell conditional to look like this\

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 0) {

And you can also add a else if statement like this

else if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 1) { c.sendMessage("You are banned from yell."); }

Then just make a command that changes their token banyell from 0 to 1.

Also if you want to make it so they are muted untill they logout, which is kind of stupid imo but whatever you need.

Client.java

public int mutedyell = 0;

Then you would make the yell command look like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 0 && mutedyell == 0) {

There ya go,

Pretty much spoonfed.

L thx for the errors -.-

Errors?

You must be brain dead if you are getting errors.
[/quote]

L not brain dead but i have got 7errors now fixed some its saying

0){
and about &&[/quote]

Can’t help you if i don’t know what you need help with…

Post the errors.

Read full topic

Basically,
Create a character token like banyell

or something similar

Then change your yell conditional to look like this\

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 0) {

And you can also add a else if statement like this

else if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 1) { c.sendMessage("You are banned from yell."); }

Then just make a command that changes their token banyell from 0 to 1.

Also if you want to make it so they are muted untill they logout, which is kind of stupid imo but whatever you need.

Then you would make the yell command look like this

no one is gonna spoonfeed you so try tyo work it out your self w/e the guy above you said

Basically,
Create a character token like banyell

or something similar

Then change your yell conditional to look like this\

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 0) {

And you can also add a else if statement like this

else if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 1) { c.sendMessage("You are banned from yell."); }

Then just make a command that changes their token banyell from 0 to 1.

Also if you want to make it so they are muted untill they logout, which is kind of stupid imo but whatever you need.

Client.java

public int mutedyell = 0;

Then you would make the yell command look like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) && banyell == 0 && mutedyell == 0) {

There ya go,

Pretty much spoonfed.

item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:371604”]1.Clickingbuttons.java

2.Start out at Dialoguehandler.java more info on dialogues here

3.You already posted this and i answered, Change the GFX to the correct ID for veng

4.Easiest way would be to make a new character token and a command that changes it from 0 to 1 and add the token equal to 0 in the conditional for yelling.[/quote]

I only understand the second but
3. you posted only a code didnt tell me how to do it -.-

Can somewane Help me!?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With 4 Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

1.Clickingbuttons.java

2.Start out at Dialoguehandler.java more info on dialogues here

3.You already posted this and i answered, Change the GFX to the correct ID for veng

4.Easiest way would be to make a new character token and a command that changes it from 0 to 1 and add the token equal to 0 in the conditional for yelling.

Read full topic
